$comment: Claude Desktop MCP Configuration - HTTP Transport
This configuration connects Claude Desktop to the local Docker MCP server
running at http://localhost:8000/mcp using streamable-http transport.
1. Start the Docker server: docker-compose up -d
2. Locate your Claude Desktop config file:
3. Copy the mcpServers section below to your config file
- Docker server must be running (docker-compose up -d)
- Port 8000 must be available on localhost
